meanings: travel, traveling, trip, tour, journey, travel, (formal) journey, take a trip, go on a trip

vlive.korean: 맞아요, 코스예요 - 제주도로 수학여행? Right, that is it. - Oh, a field trip to the Jeju island? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.19 뉴이스트의 2020 왁자지껄 운수대통 #1

vlive.korean: 이렇게 이제 해외에 여행 왔어요 - 공항에서 만났어요? We're overseas on a trip now. - Did you meet at the airport? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]

examples.korean: They’ve gone on an excursion to York. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 요크로 여행을 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She wanted to travel to broaden her horizons. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 시야를 넓히기 위해 여행을 하고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She wanted to travel to broaden her horizons. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our camping trip was spoilt by bad weather. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 캠핑 여행은 날씨가 안 좋아서 망쳐 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our camping trip was spoilt by bad weather. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 여행이 얼마나 오래 걸릴 것인지를 잘못 계산했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Towns in the guide are listed alphabetically. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 여행 안내서에 나오는 소도시들은 알파벳순으로 열거되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
